channel.title: ðŸ™‚  Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API
channel.description: Recent content in ðŸ™‚  Faces Endpoints on Custom Twemoji API

item.title: GET `/faces`
item.description: Use this endpoint to find which Twemojis are supported as faces. Arguments No arguments specific to this endpoint. See arguments available to all /faces endpoints. Example Request: CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API=https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1; curl $CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API/faces Response: 1{ 2... 3"data": { 4"1f383": { 5"0": "head", 6"1": "headwear", 7... 8}, 9"1f479": { 10"0": "head", 11"1": "head", 12... 13}, 14}, 15... 16}

item.title: GET `/faces/emoji`
item.description: Use this endpoint to get a specific Twemoji that is supported as a face. Arguments No arguments specific to this endpoint. See arguments available to all /faces endpoints. Example Request: CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API=https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1; curl $CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API/faces/1f47b Response: 1{ 2... 3"data": { 4"1f47b": { 5"0": "head", 6"1": "eyes", 7"2": "eyes", 8"3": "eyes", 9"4": "mouth" 10} 11}, 12... 13}

item.title: GET `/faces/random`
item.description: Use this endpoint to get a random Twemoji that is supported as a face. Arguments No arguments specific to this endpoint. See arguments available to all /faces endpoints. Example Request: CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API=https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1; curl $CUSTOM_TWEMOJI_API/faces/rabdom Response: 1{ 2... 3"data": { 4"1f608": { 5"0": "head", 6"1": "head", 7"2": "head", 8"3": "mouth", 9"4": "eyes", 10"5": "eyes" 11} 12}, 13"links": { 14"self": "https://customtwemojiapi.com/v1/faces/1f608" 15}, 16... 17}
